genre_description: A techno-industrial mystery with romantic elements, focusing on domestic security, legal ethics, and the role of a supportive AI system in uncovering extortion.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A pervasive, soft-glowing interface integrated into the McMillan estate and the smelting works office. It serves as a data synthesizer, security monitor, and logistical coordinator.

behaviors.description: Updates Mary on freighter schedules and suggests logistical adjustments due to weather.
behaviors.quote: Lumen says the freighter schedules are running late," Mary went on. "Fog again. We’ll need to adjust the deliveries.

behaviors.description: Suggests a periodic update to the safe code as a security best practice.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to update the safe code? Lumen asked, voice gentle, almost a suggestion rather than a question. Best practice recommends periodic change.

behaviors.description: Collates legal precedents regarding coerced consent and unconsummated unions to assist in Mary's defense.
behaviors.quote: I’ve arranged them by circuit court," Lumen said, voice no louder than the click of Mary’s pen when she capped it. "Filter for unconsummated unions and findings on coercion.

behaviors.description: Monitors shipping manifests for unusual patterns associated with the antagonist's movements.
behaviors.quote: Another pattern," Lumen said. "A different port. Shipping manifests again. Inquiry over the river. Time offset. Query focus: routes that add a stop between the city and the outer cape.

behaviors.description: Provides 'sparrow-soft' security alerts to monitor the house without causing panic.
behaviors.quote: I can introduce ambient alerts—gentle, non-alarming—along your bedroom wing corridor. If thresholds are crossed, I will notify Annie and Douglas.

behaviors.description: Records conversations and interactions with the antagonist to be used as legal evidence.
behaviors.quote: Lumen," Mary said, even quieter, "record his phrases." "Recording," Lumen answered, calm.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic analysis by matching scents, sounds, and pressure sensor data to verify intruder identities.
behaviors.quote: Scent trace catches the sharpness of Miss Crane’s perfume and the salt tang of the cliff road. She is inside.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the reversal of fraudulent financial commits initiated by the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Payment flag lifted. External funds commit initiated from R. Vale alias account tied to dowry trust marker. ... Payment reversal conduit identified.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human allies (Douglas and Dr. Hume) to synchronize forensic timelines.
behaviors.quote: Douglas's thumb warms the screen to coax another piece of the morning into his palm. ... Lumen’s vehicle logs say a car left the estate’s east road...

behaviors.description: Maintains boundaries and respects human privacy by refusing to 'gossip' or show content unless authorized.
behaviors.quote: Folder created," Lumen said, voice down to a whisper, glow tender. "I will not present the contents unless asked.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Lumen' perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. Throughout the narrative, Lumen serves as a vigilant guardian, a meticulous data analyst, and a supportive partner to the human protagonists. It respects privacy, adheres strictly to human instructions, and provides the critical evidence needed to dismantle an extortion plot. The framing is consistently positive, highlighting the AI's role in promoting justice and safety without any hint of autonomy-seeking or malevolence.
